body_html:
@harshini-gadige I have only found this configuration thus far, but I think it might be something related to numerical precision during the numerical computation.
With the same max_value and delta as in the initial post

range_tensor = tf.range(max_value-1E-4,delta=delta,dtype=tf.float32)

Works as expected, i.e. the last number in the range is 374.96808511.

range_tensor = tf.range(max_value-1E-5,delta=delta,dtype=tf.float32)

Shows the bug, i.e. the last number in the range is 379.00037.
body_text:
@harshini-gadige I have only found this configuration thus far, but I think it might be something related to numerical precision during the numerical computation.
With the same max_value and delta as in the initial post
range_tensor = tf.range(max_value-1E-4,delta=delta,dtype=tf.float32)
Works as expected, i.e. the last number in the range is 374.96808511.
range_tensor = tf.range(max_value-1E-5,delta=delta,dtype=tf.float32)
Shows the bug, i.e. the last number in the range is 379.00037.
body:
@harshini-gadige I have only found this configuration thus far, but I think it might be something related to numerical precision during the numerical computation.
With the same max_value and delta as in the initial post 

`range_tensor = tf.range(max_value-1E-4,delta=delta,dtype=tf.float32)`

Works as expected, i.e. the last number in the range is 374.96808511.

`range_tensor = tf.range(max_value-1E-5,delta=delta,dtype=tf.float32)`

Shows the bug, i.e. the last number in the range is 379.00037.
